text: How to Undress in Public Without Undue Embarrassment is a 1965 short feature from Britain directed by Compton Bennett as "Bob Compton-Bennett".HOW TO UNDRESS IN PUBLIC WITHOUT UNDUE EMBARRASSMENT Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 32, Iss. 372, (Jan 1, 1965): 136. London Diary Jones, Mervyn. New Statesman; London Vol. 74, (Jul 1, 1967): 582. ==References== ==External links== *Film page at IMDb *Film pag at BFI Category:1965 in film Category:1965 films
title: How to Undress in Public Without Undue Embarrassment
